tool.name: BuildAndCheck

param.name: lines
param.dialogReference: Lines to build polygons from (often Contacts and Faults in the geologic mapping world)

param.name: points
param.dialogReference: Points with a mapunit field for polygon attribution

param.name: quad
param.dialogReference: A boundary to cut the polygons to

param.name: selectPolys
param.dialogReference: A feature class that will contain all the polygons before they are clipped to the quad boundary

param.name: joinPolys
param.dialogReference: A feature class that will contain polygons after they are clipped to the quad boundary

param.name: layerOut
param.dialogReference: A layer file with the polygons symbolized based on the number of label points inside of each polygon

param.name: addToMXD
param.dialogReference: Add the files to an open mxd document

tool.summary: This tool builds polygons from provided points and label points and then symblizes them based on the number of label points such that one can easily find extra label points or polygons that are not attributed.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool builds polygons from provided points and label points and then symblizes them based on the number of label points such that one can easily find extra label points or polygons that are not attributed.
